literature.translation[0].definitions[0]: books, plays, poems etc that people think are important and good
He has read many of the major works of literature.
literature.translation[0].definitions[1]: all the books, articles etc on a particular subject
literature on the history of science
Several cases of mercury poisoning have been recorded in the literature.
literature.translation[0].definitions[2]: printed information produced by people who want to sell you something or tell you about something
literature.translation[1].definitions[0]: information about a product, company etc
The figure quoted in the sales literature is frankly optimistic.
literature.translation[1].definitions[1]: books, articles, etc that give information about a particular subject
